--- select_singer_with_table_alias_with_hint.sql
SELECT
  *
FROM
  Singers@{FORCE_INDEX=SingersByFirstLastName} AS S

--- AST
&ast.QueryStatement{
  Hint:  (*ast.Hint)(nil),
  Query: &ast.Select{
    Select:   0,
    Distinct: false,
    As:       nil,
    Results:  []ast.SelectItem{
      &ast.Star{
        Star: 9,
      },
    },
    From: &ast.From{
      From:   11,
      Source: &ast.TableName{
        Table: &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 18,
          NameEnd: 25,
          Name:    "Singers",
        },
        Hint: &ast.Hint{
          Atmark:  25,
          Rbrace:  61,
          Records: []*ast.HintRecord{
            &ast.HintRecord{
              Key: &ast.Ident{
                NamePos: 27,
                NameEnd: 38,
                Name:    "FORCE_INDEX",
              },
              Value: &ast.Ident{
                NamePos: 39,
                NameEnd: 61,
                Name:    "SingersByFirstLastName",
              },
            },
          },
        },
        As: &ast.AsAlias{
          As:    63,
          Alias: &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 66,
            NameEnd: 67,
            Name:    "S",
          },
        },
        Sample: (*ast.TableSample)(nil),
      },
    },
    Where:   (*ast.Where)(nil),
    GroupBy: (*ast.GroupBy)(nil),
    Having:  (*ast.Having)(nil),
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT * FROM Singers @{FORCE_INDEX=SingersByFirstLastName} AS S
